resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/82112</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>82112</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>5014</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Music and Feelings I -- Vocal Composition</string>
            <string language="es">Música y sentimientos I – Composición vocal</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol agus Mothúcháin I – Cumadóireacht Gutha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik und Gefühle I -- Vocal Aufbau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique et sentiments I -- composition vocale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música e sentimentos I -- composição vocal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica e sensibilità I -- composizione vocale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική και συναισθήματα Ι -- φωνητική σύνθεση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Focuses on music and emotions. Working in groups, children compose a piece describing a human emotion and using only the voice.</string>
            <string language="es">Se centra en la música y las emociones. Se trabaja en grupos, los niños componen una pieza en la que describen la emoción humana y usan sólo la voz.</string>
            <string language="ga">Díríonn sé ar cheol agus ar mhothúcháin. Ag obair i ngrúpaí, cumann na leanaí píosa a dhéanann cur síos ar mhothúchán daonna ag úsáid an guth amháin.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Music</string>
            <string language="es">Música. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceol</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Foki auf Musik und Gefühlen. Arbeitend in 
den Gruppen, bestehen Kinder ein Stück, das ein menschliches Gefühl 
beschreibt und nur die Stimme verwendet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Foyers sur la musique et les émotions. 
Travaillant dans les groupes, les enfants composent un morceau 
décrivant une émotion humaine et utilisant seulement la voix.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Focos na música e nas emoções. 
Trabalhando nos grupos, as crianças compõem uma parte que 
descreve uma emoção humana e que usa somente a voz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuochi su musica e su emozioni. Funzionando 
nei gruppi, i bambini compongono una parte che descrive un'emozione 
umana e che usando soltanto la voce.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εστίαση στη μουσική και τις συγκινήσεις. 
Εργαζόμενα κατά ομάδες, τα παιδιά συνθέτουν ένα κομμάτι 
που περιγράφει μια ανθρώπινη συγκίνηση και που χρησιμοποιεί μόνο 
τη φωνή.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Plan de Leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planta Da Lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programma Di Lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
